Title: Guardian's Guidance
Text: Arriving at the Gramados Police Station, I need to locate Officer Reynolds and seek his guidance on my journey to become a guardian of the community.
CompleteText: After a thorough search of the police station, I found Officer Reynolds' office on the second floor, as instructed. Engaging in conversation with him, I expressed my intent to acquire the necessary skills to safeguard the community. Officer Reynolds, recognizing my commitment, provided me with a sturdy baton and a med kit, essential tools for my duties as a guardian of Gramados City. With his guidance, I am now ready to embark on my first mission to ensure the safety and security of our citizens.
